title: How do you like your coffee GD? (or tea if that is your thing)
body:
I prefer my coffee so black it is opaque.

I don't use any form of sugar or creamer, as it tends to give me migraines.

I like tea too, but i find myself being a bit snobby about how it is steeped and what type of tea i am steeping and the exact temperature of the water.. so I often times avoid doing it because I get all caught up in the details. I tend to use loose leaf tea and a cast iron teapot, but I will also use the standard old tea bags if I am looking for a quick fix.

what do you guys like? if you don't drink coffee or tea... what is your favorite beverage?
